God calls for decided changes in his work proportionate to the elevated character of the truth of these last days. Unless those repent who have been handling sacred things in the spirit manifested by the great apostate, their candlestick will be removed out of his place. The message of God is, "Remember then from whence thou art fallen, and 
                                                                           1641
repent, and do the first works: or else I will come unto thee quickly and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent."
